txt.en: The seal on this vase is still tight, even after all the weather-worn years it has sat among the ruins here. Looking around, you see a few others. Perhaps the Rangers can learn something of value from their contents.
'It looks like at least three of these are still sealed, and the fourth may yet hold some secrets. This is wonderful!'
'If we can discover the secrets of how our forebears ran these estates, we can begin to restore them ourselves.'
Sealed vases might still contain notes, papers, or spices from a long-forgotten time.
Tham Varan is east of Tinnudir and Tham Nambarth.\n\nYou should go to Tham Varan and collect several vases for the Rangers of Tinnudir.
The Rangers are at Tinnudir, west of Tham Varan and Tham Nambarth.\n\nOne of the Rangers will be excited to begin examining the contents of the vases you found at Tham Varan.
